Package com.pasdam.regexren.controller

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ErrorListener
    Interface implemented by those components that need to be notified in case of error
    FilesListManager.FilesListListener
    Interface to be implemented by listeners that need to be notified when the list of files change
    FilterManager.FiltersListener
    Interface that listener that want to be notified when the selected filter changed must implement
    LocaleManager.Localizable
    Interface implemented by localizable components
    RulesManager.RulesListener
    Interface implemented by all components that need to be notified of rules list changes
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ApplicationManager
    Application manager, it allows access to all data managers
    ErrorListenerManager
    Abstract manager that support error notification
    FilesListManager
    Manager of the files list
    FilterManager
    Class that manages set and notification of the current FileFilter used
    LocaleManager
    Class that manages the locale of the application
    LogManager
    Logger manager, it forward event messages to the logger
    PreferenceManager
    Preferences manager.
    RulesManager
    Manager that keep a list of all renaming rules to apply
